name: maintain
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: maintain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to continue to have; to keep in existence, or not allow to become less

example.eg: The army has been brought in to maintain order in the region.
example.egtrans: 军队已被调来维持这一地区的秩序。

example.eg: Despite living in different countries, the two families have maintained close links.
example.egtrans: 尽管住在不同的国家，两个家庭仍保持着紧密联系。

example.eg: The film has maintained its position as the critics' favourite for another year.
example.egtrans: 这部电影再度被评论家评为年度最佳影片。

dsense.name: maintain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to keep a road, machine, building, etc. in good condition

example.eg: A large house costs a lot to maintain.
example.egtrans: 保养一座大房子花费很高。

example.eg: The roads in the town have been very poorly maintained.
example.egtrans: 城镇的道路保养得很差。

dsense.name: maintain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to express firmly your belief that something is true

example.eg: Throughout his prison sentence, Dunn has always maintained his innocence.
example.egtrans: 邓恩在监狱服刑期间一直坚称自己是无辜的。

example.eg: He maintains that he has never seen the woman before.
example.egtrans: 他坚称以前从未见过那位妇女。

dsense.name: maintain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to provide someone with food and whatever is necessary for them to live on

example.eg: They barely earn enough to maintain themselves and their four children.
example.egtrans: 他们赚的钱勉强够养活自己和4个孩子。
